contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} '''Otto von Kerpen''' (died 1208) was the second [[Grand Masters of the Teutonic Knights|Grand Master]] of the [[Teutonic Knights]], from 1200 to 1208. Otto came from a poor [[Rhineland|Rhenish]] knightly family residing in the castle of Kerpen in [[Kerpen, Rhineland-Palatinate]]. While Grand Master, he strove to make the Teutonic Knights independent from the older military orders of the [[Knights Templar]] and the [[Knights Hospitaller]].
